button.name: action_set_to_draft
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset? This action will delete any existing evaluation record for the WSP

button.name: action_submit
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to submit this WSP?

page.name: implementation_report
page.div: This form require employers to report on all training interventions that took place in their company in the previous financial year. The employer must report both credit and non-credit bearing interventions.

label.string: I hereby confirm that the following information submitted is complete, accurate and not missleading

p.ul:
Note:
Other in the form refers to non- South African citizens.
Your disability ratio must be included in your male and female ratio. For example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 are disabled.
Other option allows you to report on foreign nationals included in Race gender break down. For Example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 of the males are foreign nationals, out of the total of 4 foreign nationals 1 is disabled.

page.name: pivotal_trained_beneficiaries
page.div: This form require employers to only report training interventions that are listed on the South African Qualifications Authority’s (SAQA) list and are aligned to the National Qualifications Framework (NQF).

label.string: We did not host any PIVOTAL programmes
I hereby confirm that the following information submitted is complete, accurate and not missleading

p.ul:

Other in the form refers to non- South African citizens.
Your disability ratio must be included in your male and female ratio. For example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 are disabled.
Other option allows you to report on foreign nationals included in Race gender break down. For Example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 of the males are foreign nationals, out of the total of 4 foreign nationals 1 is disabled.

page.div: This form require employers to report on all the occupations that took your organisation longer than six (6) months to find a suitably experienced and qualified replacement.

label.string: We did not have any Hard to Fill Vacancies

page.div: This form require employers to report all the skills that are needed by an employee to carry out job tasks competently. It is also referred to as “Top-up Skills”.

label.string: We did not have any Hard to Fill Vacancies

tr.th: List the top 3 common Skills Gaps
Identify up to maximum of 3 reasons per skills page

tr.td: Skilled Agriculture, Forestry, Fishery, Craft and Related Trades Workers
Plant and Machine Operators and Assemblers

Other option allows you to report on foreign nationals included in Race gender break down. For Example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 of the males are foreign nationals, out of the total of 4 foreign nationals 1 is disabled.

page.name: learning_programmes
page.div: This form require employers to report on the name of programmes that your employees were trained on in the previous financial year. Report both credit and non-credit bearing programmes.

label.string: I hereby confirm that the following information submitted is complete, accurate and not missleading

page.name: variance
page.div:
This form compare the planned beneficiaries plan for the previous year’s submission against the trained beneficiaries report for the current year’s submission. Employers are only required to state reasons provided they have trained less than what was planned for.
A Negative variance means that planned beneficiaries is greater than trained beneficiaries
A positive Variance means that planned beneficiaries is less than trained beneficiaries

label.string: I hereby confirm that the following information submitted is complete, accurate and not missleading

page.name: trained_aet
page.div: This form require the employer to report on the training interventions conducted to assist employees who hold a qualification that is below NQF level 4 (Grade 12) to attain a qualification that is at NQF level 4.

Note:
Other in the form refers to non- South African citizens.
Your disability ratio must be included in your male and female ratio. For example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 are disabled.
Other option allows you to report on foreign nationals included in Race gender break down. For Example: 5 males + 5 females = 10 employees of the 10 employees 2 of the males are foreign nationals, out of the total of 4 foreign nationals 1 is disabled.

page.div:
This form require employer to answer the following questions about their companies:
· The process that was followed to develop the workplace skills plan and annual training report.
· Changes in roles, competences, staff compliments and productivity.
· Training spend and core of your business.

tr.td: 1.1. What process was used to develop the Workplace Skills Plan?
1.1.1. Please add additional comments if applicable
1.2. Provide a brief summary of the impact of the legislation on the organization i.e. FAIS regulatory exams
1.3. Note: Question must be posed and completed by people in the following occupational areas and not completed by SDF: How much has your job changed in the last 12 months and in the last 3 years?
1.3.3. Software Developer / Programmer / IT related occupations
1.4. Has your Organisation gone through any restructuringin the past 12 months due to merger/acquisition?
1.5. Number of people retrenched/dismissed/resigned for the period 1 January 2019 to 31 December 2019
1.6. In order to measure the impact of training in your Organisation kindly state:
1.6.1. Has productivity increased or decreased in the Organisation?
1.6.2. What are your findings based on?
1.7. Class of Business for the Organisation
1.8. What is the percentage of payroll spent on training?

label.string: I hereby confirm that the following information submitted is complete, accurate and not missleading
